Name: Base Station, Migdal Transportation Corp., Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Migdal Transportation Corp. also known as Migdal Transportation Corp for a license to operate a new base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Migdal Transportation Corp. also known as Migdal Transportation Corp for a license to operate a new base station at 5010 Twelfth Avenue in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 




LS#1999
7/14/1999
